description:
As you all should know, I am trying to spread the Serviced duties around my team of guys.
It's been tricky making the shift. I don't want you all tire of the same ole guy (Me!) sucking dick, but I keep hearing positive feedback, and the guys trust me, especially after they have done a solo with me.
They seem to be more nervous when a whole new guy comes in to blow 'em, though I think Brennan would have been nervous no matter who was doing it.
Saber was at the ready for this blow job, and he worked real hard at getting Brennan hard. He stayed pretty nervous, but even though he has a straight porn to look at, he eventually really looks at Saber...and I mean look. Not a sex look, but just Looks at him with a capital L. You have to see the movie.
The bust shot was quick too, thank goodness I have several angles. I think it all shot over his shoulder cuz I sure couldn't find but a few drops on his body, and Saber slurped up pretty quick anything on his fist.
This vid is right on the money if you like your guys straight, nervous, hard, and bustin!
title: Brennan & Bryan - Serviced
